DOCNAME: CASE OF METZOVÁ v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 13;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the applicant introduced before the GPE CARDINAL ORG ( obvodní soud ) an action seeking the division of matrimonial property . According to the Government , the action was notified to the court on DATE . On DATE the applicant ’s former husband submitted his written comments on CARDINAL pages .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held a hearing which was adjourned in order to have an expert report drawn up . On DATE an expert was appointed .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the court invited the parties to an information meeting scheduled for DATE . However , the parties did not attend .

CARDINAL . On DATE another hearing was held in the absence of the defendant . On CARDINAL DATE the expert informed the court that due to the defendant ’s failure to cooperate , he was not able to draw up the opinion . On DATE the court ordered the parties to cooperate with the expert .

CARDINAL . On DATE the defendant notified the court that due to his illness , he could not submit the relevant documents , which he finally did on DATE . On DATE the case file was sent to the expert who , in the meantime , had been withdrawn . On DATE a new CARDINAL was appointed . The case file was sent to him on DATE . On DATE the expert , having been urged to do so on DATE , sent the case file back to the court stating that due to his workload , he did not have time to prepare the report . On DATE the court appointed another expert and , on DATE , it sent him the case file .

CARDINAL . On DATE the expert informed ORG that he did not have necessary documents . On DATE the court met the expert . On DATE it invited the parties to submit a copy of an entry in ORG and a copy of a land map . On DATE the court pressed the expert to prepare his opinion . He replied on DATE that he still did not have the necessary documents . On DATE the court then imposed a procedural fine on the defendant who , on DATE , appealed . On DATE the expert presented his report .

CARDINAL . At a hearing held on DATE , the parties expressed their willingness to reach a friendly settlement . Another hearing was held on DATE . The defendant submitted his comments on the expert report on DATE . DATE , the court ordered the expert to amend his report in accordance with the defendant ’s objections , which he did on DATE . At the same time , it appointed an expert to assess the value of movable property . She submitted her expert report on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE another expert was appointed to assess the value of other items . The expert informed the court , on DATE , that he was not sufficiently qualified for this work . On DATE the court appointed a new expert who , however , repetitively did not take out the case file . The court then appointed another expert , to whom the case file was sent on DATE . The expert report was submitted on DATE .
CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE ORG , having held CARDINAL hearings on DATE , DATE and DATE respectively , delivered a judgment by which it divided the matrimonial property .

CARDINAL . On DATE the defendant appealed . On CARDINAL DATE the judge dealing with the case requested the president of the court to withdraw her from the proceedings following the defendant ’s insulting statements about her . She said that she felt biased . On DATE ORG ( městský soud ) granted her request .

CARDINAL . On DATE the case was assigned to another judge who , on DATE , invited the defendant to supplement his appeal . He complied on DATE . DATE , the case was sent to ORG which , however , sent it back with a request to supplement it .

CARDINAL . On DATE the parties were ordered to pay court fees . On DATE the case was again brought to ORG which , on DATE , quashed the lower court ’s judgment and remitted the case to it for further consideration .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was invited to amend her action in accordance with the guidelines of ORG . On DATE she objected that the appellate court ’s decision was incomprehensible . On DATE the court delivered a rectifying resolution . On DATE the applicant supplemented her action . On DATE the defendant was invited to make his comments . Having been urged to do so on DATE and CARDINAL DATE respectively , he complied on DATE .

CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE ORG again decided on the distribution of the matrimonial property . On DATE both parties appealed . On DATE they were invited to supplement their appeals . The defendant complied on DATE , amending his arguments on DATE , after a lawyer had been appointed for him on DATE . The applicant presented her amendment on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court received the defendant ’s comments on the applicant ’s appeal . On DATE the defendant “ rectified ” his appeal . On DATE the case file was sent to ORG . On DATE the defendant asked the court to grant him time to adduce further documentary evidence . On CARDINAL DATE he submitted new comments on the applicant ’s appeal . On DATE the case file was submitted to the appellate court .
CARDINAL . On DATE the defendant requested that a public hearing be adjourned .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG appointed an expert to amend the expert report . The expert complied on DATE .
CARDINAL . In a decision of CARDINAL DATE the court upheld ORG judgment . On DATE this decision became final .

CARDINAL . On DATE the defendant filed an appeal on points of law ( dovolání ) . On CARDINAL DATE the case file was sent to ORG ( PERSON ) which , on DATE , suspended the enforcement of the judgment . It appears that the proceedings are still pending .
